name: Pirate Defender
description:
CONTROLS:

W - Walk forward

Left Click - Use the sword

Rigth Click - Pick up chests from the ground

Attack the red hat pirates to make them drop the chest (3 hits = death), once you have picked up the chest go to the center to place it with the rest. 

Once you have ran out of chests the game will automatically restart.

All done by my self (except the music and sounds).

I would really appreciate any kind of feedback!!
